meals.cooking_tip: Heat a pan over medium-high heat with a bit of oil. Sear the meat until browned on both sides and cooked through. Lightly saut or steam the vegetables to retain nutrients and crunch.

meals.name: Bass with Carrot with Pasta
meals.preparation_tip: Use a non-stick pan for easier cleanup.
meals.cooking_tip: Season the fish with salt and pepper, then pan-sear or steam until flaky and tender. Lightly saut or steam the vegetables to retain nutrients and crunch. Boil or steam the carbs until tender—around 10–15 minutes depending on type.
